# RealityViewAttachments

**Structure**

The attachments that belong to a RealityView.

## Declaration

```swift
struct RealityViewAttachments
```

## Overview

Use this type to access entities associated with the attachments you provide to your [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityView] via the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityView/init(make:update:attachments:)] initializer.

## Instance Methods

- **entity(for:)**: Gets the identified attachment view as an entity, if the view with that identifier exists.

## SwiftUI view attachments

- **RealityViewAttachmentBuilderContent**: A view that gathers the attachment content for your current reality view.
- **Attachment**: An attachment content you can use to gather an identifier and view.
- **ViewAttachmentEntity**: An entity that has a view attachment.
- **ViewAttachmentComponent**: A component containing additional information about a view attachment entity provided  via the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityViewAttachments/entity(for:)] function.
- **PresentationComponent**: A component that presents a SwiftUI modal presentation from a RealityKit entity.
- **TextComponent**: A component that draws 2D text at an entity’s location.
